name: Dumbest Dungeon
description:
A dungeon crawling card battler with a sense of humor where game balance should be.

Crawn dungeons, collect cards, meet weird and interesting creatures. Make levels unlock new characters and cards, fight bosses and generally have a surprisingly awful time.

Dumbest Dungeon is a parody fantasy game with it's own wild and weird setting. Predominately you will explore dungeons in first person armed with only your cards and a very poor sense of self preservation.

  • Dungeon Crawler *check*
  • RPG *check*
  • Card Game *check*
  • Well balanced and managed game design ....?

Well 3/4 is good still 75% so who's complaining.

Built for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022
